scripts.build:history: allure generate test-results -o allure-history; cp -r allure-history/history test-results/history
scripts.build: allure generate test-results -o allure-report --clean --single-file; cp allure-report/index.html reporting-app/public/reports/$(date +'%Y%m%d_%H%M%S').html
scripts.tests: npm run start; npm run build; npm run report-server
scripts.jenkins: playwright test; /opt/homebrew/bin/allure generate test-results -o allure-report --clean --single-file; playwright show-report allure-report &
